text: Hey everyone, I'm Ivan and today I'm going to tell you how to kickstart your IELTS career. I'm working as iOS software engineer for the last seven years and heading back. summary: - Ivan: I'm going to tell you how to kickstart your IELTS career. He says there are three steps: education, GitHub and first job. Ivan: Record your interview to get back to any question at any time. It's important to have a good supervisor.
